content: Each shipped feature/change linked to Jira/Epic reference, rollout channel, and owner; items grouped by tier (GA, beta, fixes).
Customer impact and mitigation for breaking changes clearly flagged with callouts and dates.
Screenshots, animated GIFs, or Loom walkthroughs attached for UI/UX-facing updates.
Support enablement snippet provided (FAQ answers, escalation path, known limitations).
Localization handoff package delivered (source markdown, glossary terms, tone guidance) within 24 hours of English publish.
